text.div:
This code system http://mitwfhir.dicom.org.tw/fhir/CodeSystem/NASH-Portal-Inflammation defines the following codes:

CodeDisplay
0 no portal inflammation
1 mild (sprinkling of inflammatory cells in <1/3 of portal tracts)
3 moderate (increased inflammatory cells in 1/3~2/3 of portal tracts)
4 marked (dense packing of inflammatory cells in >2/3 of portal tracts)

concept.display: mild (sprinkling of inflammatory cells in <1/3 of portal tracts)
moderate (increased inflammatory cells in 1/3~2/3 of portal tracts)
marked (dense packing of inflammatory cells in >2/3 of portal tracts)
